Class ChunkStreamConfiguration.Builder<TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.channel.builder.ChunkStreamConfiguration.Builder<TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    TYPE - the configurable object type.

    ChunkStreamConfiguration

    public static final class ChunkStreamConfiguration.Builder<TYPE>
extends Object
    Builder of object configurations.

      • configured

        @NotNull
public TYPE configured()
        Applies this configuration and returns the configured object.
        Returns:
        the configured object.

      • with

        @NotNull
public ChunkStreamConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> with(@Nullable
                                                            ChunkStreamConfiguration configuration)
        Applies the specified configuration to this builder. A null value means that all the configuration options will be reset to their default, otherwise only the non-default options will be applied.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the output stream configuration.
        Returns:
        this builder.

      • withChunkSize

        @NotNull
public ChunkStreamConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> withChunkSize(int chunkSize)
        Sets the size of the data chunks used to transfer bytes through the routine channels.
        Parameters:
        chunkSize - the chunk size.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number is less than 1.

      • withCorePoolSize

        @NotNull
public ChunkStreamConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> withCorePoolSize(int poolSize)
        Sets the maximum number of chunks retained in the pool. Additional chunks created to fulfill the bytes requirement will be discarded.
        Parameters:
        poolSize - the pool size.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number is less than 0.

      • withOnClose

        @NotNull
public ChunkStreamConfiguration.Builder<TYPE> withOnClose(@Nullable
                                                                   ChunkStreamConfiguration.CloseActionType closeAction)
        Sets the action to be taken when the output stream is closed. A null value means that it is up to the specific implementation to choose a default one.
        Parameters:
        closeAction - the close action.
        Returns:
        this builder.
